name: Switch
author: Fuse Official
description: Multi-way branching based on value matching.

inputs.name: value
inputs.label: Value to Switch
inputs.description: The value to check against cases (supports templates)

inputs.name: cases
inputs.label: Cases
inputs.description: JSON object mapping case names to expected values. Returns the key of matched value.

outputs.name: matched
outputs.label: Matched Case
outputs.description: The key of the matched case (or 'default')
